articles.title: Raiders fill quarterback gap with reported signing of Jimmy Garoppolo - The Guardian
articles.description: Quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo has agreed to a three-year, $67.5m contract with the Las Vegas Raiders, according to an Associated Press source
articles.content: Quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo has agreed to a three-year, $67.5m contract with the Las Vegas Raiders, according to an Associated Press source. Garoppolos contract is understood to include $34m in guara… [+1933 chars]

articles.author: Milan Ordoñez
articles.title: Dana White to Dvalishvili: Turning down title fight against ‘friend’ Sterling is a ‘really bad idea’ - Bloody Elbow
articles.description: For Dana White, Merab Dvalishvili would be making a mistake for turning down a title fight against Aljamain Sterling because of friendship.
articles.content: With a win over former champion Petr Yan on Saturday at UFC Vegas 71, Merab Dvalishvili has inched his way closer to the top. Sitting on that spot, of course, is Aljamain Sterling, a close friend and… [+1841 chars]
